description:
The Shinsengumi was shaken to the core by Ito’s takeover plan. And the person who was really behind the whole plot is revealed! Ito discovers he was just being manipulated and what Hijikata and Kondo`s true feelings about him are. And as he lies dying of his wounds, Ito is finally able to reexamine his life and come to terms with himself. As the Shinsengumi fiercely clash against attacking ronin, Gintoki and Bansai Kawakami`s battle-to-the-death nears its conclusion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anything Depends on the Beat and the Timing
何事もノリとタイミング
